    • Method Detail

      • readYesNo

        protected static boolean readYesNo​(String prompt,
                                   boolean defaultYes)
        Prompts for "y" or "n".
        Parameters:
        prompt - Prompt string. The string " (y/n) " will be appended.
        defaultYes - If "yes" should be the default. Otherwise "no" will be the default.
        Returns:
        True if "yes" was answered, false if "no" was answered.

      • getCommandPath

        public String[] getCommandPath()
        Specified by:
        getCommandPath in interface CliCommandPlugin
        Returns:
        a path of super commands leading to this command. Conflicts will be resolved at runtime.

      • getCommandPathAliases

        public Set<String[]> getCommandPathAliases()
        Specified by:
        getCommandPathAliases in interface CliCommandPlugin
        Returns:
        aliases for the super commands leading to this path. Conflicts will be resolved at runtime.

        public static List<String> splitStringIntoLines​(String input,
                                                int lineLength)
        Private utility method that takes a string and splits it by line length
        Parameters:
        input - the string to format
        lineLength - the length of each line
        Returns:
        an list of strings, no longer than the given length
